website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest portable TVs on the market that comes at a decent price with a lot of features.
pros: Comes with a lithium ion rechargeable battery
Decent sound quality and remote control
Includes a kick-out stand on the rear
cons: If a local TV signal is weak, you may need an extra antenna

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL LITTLE TV!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little TV - I use it on my drawing desk and plan on buying a second on for my work table. My regular TV is out of eye-sight so these little sets are perfect. I have the 12" and its large enough to see the picture well yet small enough to fit on the tables. The external antenna is small but powerful enough to pick up a lot of stations. And the sound quality is very very good. It has other options that are available which makes it not just a one trick pony. HIGHTLY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: No Signal, No problem
customer_reviews.text: Do buy a recommended or 'frequently bought together' antenna. When you first use the TV you will see 'No Signal'. Over The Air ATSC is the default input. Do a channel automatic programming setup (Menu selection). The antenna that came with my unit didn't screw together. The suggested antenna works great. Very good picture and sound. Haven't had this TV long enough to review battery life. Bought to have local stations when we have power outages. So far, very satisfied. Probably guarantees our power won't go out again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product after Hurricane Florence and no power for extended period. Once received, it worked great! Bought another antenna with it, but really didn't need it at all. Picked up a lot of stations and did so very well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV With Nice Picture and Lasting Battery
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend. She says it works very well and has a great picture. Highly recommends it for your storm ready items. The car charger addition makes it do double duty for when power is out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: This battery operated TV has a good sound and picture. However I was only able to get a few channels in my area with the magnetic antennae that came with it. I was able to get over twenty channels when I purchased a better quality portable antennae. Unfortunately it only lasted 7 months.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE TV
customer_reviews.text: So far a great little TV. Sure nice to have around when the big one goes out. While the little antenna does bring in about 33 stations in my area, I have move it often for a clear signal.
